SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Clock
Clock represents a singleton clock that keeps track of the simulation time.
Country
Country represents a country with a name, money, population, resources, and people.
CountryDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on CountryEntity.
CountryEntity
Entity class representing a Country in the database.
CountryMetricsDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on CountryMetricsEntity.
CountryMetricsEntity
Entity class representing the metrics of a Country for a given day.
CreditsViewController
 
DefaultCountryDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on the "default_country" database table.
DefaultResourceDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on the "default_resource" database table.
Event
Event represents an event in the simulation with a specific type and time.
EventList
EventList represents a list of events in the simulation, managed as a priority queue.
EventType
EventType represents the types of events that can occur in the simulation.
Main
 
MariaDbConnection
Utility class for managing database connections and executing SQL scripts in MariaDB.
MenuViewController
 
Person
Person represents a segment of individuals in a country, with preferences and demand for resources, and happiness.
Resource
Resource represents an abstract resource with a name, priority, base capacity, and production cost.
ResourceDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on ResourceEntity.
ResourceEntity
Entity class representing a Resource within the system.
ResourceInfo
ResourceInfo represents the information about a resource, including its quantity, value, and supply archive.
ResourceMetricsDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on ResourceMetricsEntity.
ResourceMetricsEntity
Entity class representing the metrics of a resource within a specific country on a given day.
ResourceNode
ResourceNode represents a node that produces and stores resources for a country.
ResourceNodeDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on ResourceNodeEntity.
ResourceNodeDTO
ResourceNodeDTO represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for a resource node, containing information about its tier, base capacity, production cost, and associated resource.
ResourceNodeEntity
Entity class representing a resource node within a country.
ResourceNodeEntityId
Identifier class for the ResourceNodeEntity entity.
ResourceNodeMetricsDao
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing operations on ResourceNodeMetricsEntity.
ResourceNodeMetricsEntity
Entity class representing metrics of a resource node in a specific country on a given day.
SettingsViewController
 
SimulationConfig
SimulationConfig provides configuration settings for the simulation, including simulation time, delay, supply archive time, and population segment size.
SimulationController
 
SimulationView
 
Simulator
Simulator manages the execution of the simulation, including initializing, running, and finalizing the simulation.
